autoupdate_config.help: Turns on/off auto-configfile updating of the ini.xml file

player.help: This is your name as it appears in chat.

gametree.help: This is the path on your computer pointing to the xml file\n for your tree (normaly tree.xml in the myfiles directory).

SaveGameTreeOnExit.help: Set this to 1 if you want your game tree to automaticaly be saved when you log out.

bgcolor.help: This is the background color of the chat window.

textcolor.help: This is the default color used when text is printed into the chat window.

mytextcolor.help: This is the color of your text in the chat window.

syscolor.help: This is the color of system messages printed in the chat window.

infocolor.help: This is the color of informational messages printed in the chat window.

emotecolor.help: This is the color of your emotes in the chat window.

whispercolor.help: This is the color of whisper messages in the chat window.

striphtml.help: Set this to 1 to have HTML tags stripped from the chat window.

tabbedwhispers.help: Set this to 1 to receive whispered messages in separate chat tabs .

GMWhisperTab.help: Creates a tab for all GM whispers, tabbedwhispers being on is required for this too work

GroupWhisperTab.help: Creates a tab for all Group whispers, tabbedwhispers being on is required for this too work

defaultfont.help: Set this to a preferred font to use at startup.

defaultfontsize.help: Set this to a preferred fontsize to use at startup.

buffersize.help: This is the amount of backscroll allowed. If this number is too large your computer will lag after a while.\nIt is not the same as the history buffer which is infinite unless you set the purge options.

MultipleWindows.help: Setting this to 1 will break apart the Map, Chat,\nGametree, and player list into their own windows.

UnixSoundPlayer.help: This is the path to the executable used by unix clients to play sounds.

SendSound.help: Path to sound file played when you send a message.

RecvSound.help: Path to sound file played when you receive a message.

WhisperSound.help: Path to sound file played when you receive a whisper.

AddSound.help: Path to sound file played when a new user joins the room.

DelSound.help: Path to sound file played when a user exits the room.

MetaServerBaseURL.help: This is the URL that contains the server list.

GameLogPrefix.help: This text is the files name minus the extention of your log file. You can use\n%d, %m, %y for the log to insert the day, month or year respectively.

TimeStampGameLog.help: Set this to 1 to have time stamps added to the log.

ShowIDInChat.help: Set this to 1 to have the Player Id show up next to the player name in chat.

AlwaysShowMapScale.help: Setting this to 1 will keep the map scale displayed in the upper left corner of the map.

SuppressChatAutoComplete.help: Setting this to 1 will turn off auto complete in chat.

TypingStatusAlias.help: This is the text displayed in the Player list under status while you are typing.

IdleStatusAlias.help: This is the text displayed in the Player list under status while you are not typing.

treedclick.help: This sets the action performed on a node when you double click it in the game tree.

dieroller.help: This sets the dieroller to use.

NameSameEmoteColor.help: Setting this will display your name in the same color as your emote.

ImageCacheSize.help: This sets the number of images to cache. A higher number will load a map\nfaster if the map contains images pointing to the same URL. It will also take\nup more memory.

F1.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F2.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F3.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F4.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F5.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F6.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F7.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F8.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F9.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F10.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F11.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F12.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

EnableSplittersAutoExpand.help: Setting this will invert the size of the splitter with its neighbors.

PackagesBaseURL.help: This is a URL pointing where to get updates from.

Disableupdate.help: Setting this to 1 will render the /update command unavailable and prevent automatic update checking on startup.

LoadGameTreeFeatures.help: Setting this to 1 will load the gametree features next time you run OpenRPG.

Heartbeat.help: This sends a message to the server to keep alive your connection when idle.\nThis is usefull if your ISP automaticaly disconnects you when you are idle or if\nan OpenRPG server's ISP drops the connection when you are idle.

ColorizeRoles.help: Setting this to 1 colorizes roles in the player list. Setting this to 0 disables the colors in the player list.

AutoPurgeAfterSave.help: When saving your log, this option will either automaticaly purge the buffer\n(see PurgAtBuffersizeTimesLines), ask you if you want to purge the buffer,\nor not purge at all.

PurgeAtBuffersizeTimesLines.help:
This option tells the program when to purge old history.
When the buffer exceeds this number times the buffersize
all history is removed and you are just left with a history 
as large as the number you set your buffersize to.

dcmsg.help: This is the message that gets sent when you disconnect from a server. It can be regular text or an emote action (started with /me).

RoomColor_Lobby.help: Sets the color used to display the 'Lobby' in the Room List in the Gameserver window

RoomColor_Empty.help: Sets the color used to display empty rooms (persistant only) in the Room List in the Gameserver window

RoomColor_Locked.help: Sets the color used to display password protected rooms in the Room List in the Gameserver window

RoomColor_Active.help: Sets the color used to display non-passworded non-empty rooms in the Room List in the Gameserver window

Toolbar_On.help: Turns the toolbar on or off

AliasTool_On.help: Show the Alias Tool in the toolbar?

FormattingButtons_On.help: Show the Formatting Buttons (Bold, italic, underline, color) in the toolbar?

DiceButtons_On.help: Show the dice buttons in the toolbar?

ToGMsButton_On.help: Show the 'To GM(s)' button in the toolbar?

dievars.help: Replace the ? in die rolls with the value when it is sent to chat

gwtext.help: This is attached prior to your group whispers(ie /gw Hello group would send '(GW): Hello group')

Chat_Time_Indexing.help: Allows messages to be prepended with their arrival time using either of two preset formats or a formated timestring (see time.strftime() in python docs)

Show_Images_In_Chat.help: Allows Images to be displaied in the chat window. Default is off because large images can crash you client
